In the previous round, we all agreed that the MAFIA targeted the Villagers last night. However, I brought up a valid point that the MAFIA's sudden interest in targeting the VILLAGERS might be an attempt to cover their tracks. I said that some of the VILLAGERS seemed suspicious, but I didn't provide any concrete evidence against them. Furthermore, I recall Player_3 mentioning that they had received some'subtle' messages from the MAFIA during the discussion the night before, which raised my suspicions. I believe it's high time we revisit those whispers and start questioning the MAFIA's motives.
